meanings.definition: The process of making something automated or controlled by robots.
meanings.sent1: The robotization of the factory increased efficiency.
meanings.sent2: Many industries are embracing robotization to streamline operations.
meanings.sent3: The robotization of the kitchen made cooking a breeze.
meanings.sent4: In the future, robotization may revolutionize how we work.
meanings.sent5: The robotization of the assembly line was a game-changer for production.

meanings.definition: The act of replacing human labor with machines or robots.
meanings.sent1: Robotization in the automotive industry led to job losses.
meanings.sent2: Companies are investing in robotization to cut costs.
meanings.sent3: The robotization of the office left many employees with free time.
meanings.sent4: The rise of robotization sparked debates about the future of work.
meanings.sent5: The impact of robotization on employment cannot be ignored.
